titles.title: Clean Energy Hydrogen Innovation Act

To amend title XVII of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 relating to the eligibility for loan guarantees for projects relating to hydrogen production, delivery, infrastructure, storage, fuel cells, and end uses, and for other purposes.
Clean Energy Hydrogen Innovation Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Clean Energy Hydrogen Innovation Act
This bill expands the types of hydrogen projects that are eligible for loan guarantees from the Department of Energy.
